cst8284.assignment1

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • cst8284.assignment1.FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    FileUtils has the purpose to check the File which will load in the class TaskManager, check the name of the file, its absolute path (from where the file has been taken from) and writes all the changes made there.
    Since:
    2017-03-26
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Chrystian Rafael Sanches dos Santos and David Houtmad.
    See Also:
    cst8284.assignment1

        public java.util.ArrayList<cst8284.assignment1.ToDo> getToDoArray(java.lang.String fileName)
        Gets all the data from the File and store into an ArrayList of ToDos. It uses the java.io.FileInputStream and ObjectInputStream to make this function.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file name
        Returns:
        toDos the ArrayList containing the ToDo objects.

        Parameters:
        toDo - the ArrayList of ToDo objects.
        fileName - the file name.
